name: Horror Paintings Parodies
description:
This is a Special edition with ALL NEW parodies full of horror, Famous scary paintings by Goya, Blake, Munch, Michelangelo, Caravaggio, Rubens, Titian, Ingres, Kahlo and many more
This time many new things:
Open an Extra Round level finding the 3 hidden pentagram stars
Find 7 soul paintings in hell
More parodies and 62 Medals for your collection.
All Drawings were made on October 2014
